subject: Automatically enumerating tests from production code

Ole Ersoy wrote:

> Assuming the code is correct, it's possible to
> generate the "100% enumerated" set of tests.

Suppose your method depends on an instance of an interface. How do you 
intend to enumerate tests that depend on the behavior of that interface? 
In Java, I'm aware of no way to write code to describe the intended 
behavior of an interface method.
